Class Maze

  • java.lang.Object
    • Maze

  • public class Maze
extends java.lang.Object
    Primary class of the maze solver. Contains all the fields and methods necessary for solving a maze.
    Author:
    Stephen Hoerner
    See Also:
    "No external resources used"

    • Constructor Detail

      • Maze

        public Maze()
        Constructs a default Maze object.

      • Maze

        public Maze(int[][] grid)
     throws java.lang.IllegalArgumentException
        Constructs a Maze object, with a custom set of grid values. Verifies that the maze has adequate dimensions.
        Parameters:
        grid - the custom maze grid
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if the dimensions were invalid

    • Method Detail

      • toString

        public java.lang.String toString()
        Returns the Maze in a viewable format. Each row is on a line, with each column separated by a space.
        Overrides:
        toString in class java.lang.Object
        Returns:
        the Maze as a string

      • solve

        public boolean solve()
        Simple-looking method that recursively solves the entire maze.
        Returns:
        whether a solution was found

      • solve

        private boolean solve(int row,
            int col)
        Inner recursive method for solving the maze. Works through all the possible options, unwinding/backtracking when necessary.
        Parameters:
        row - current row index
        col - current column index
        Returns:
        whether a solution was found
